A Flying Jatt

Movie |

Superhero

  • Release Date: 25 Aug 2016
  • Genre(s): Fantasy, Action, Adventure
  • Language(s): हिन्दी
  • Director(s): Remo D'Souza, Yusuf Khan, Prachi Tyagi
  • Cast(s): Tiger Shroff, Jacqueline Fernandez, Nathan Jones, Kay Kay Menon, Amrita Singh See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 31min
  • Music: Jigar Saraiya,Daler Mehndi,Atif Aslam,Sachin Sanghvi,Vishal Dadlani
  • Award(s): Film 2016 (Won)
    Film 2016 (Nominated) Awards List

    Jatt is a reluctant super hero that fights crime and protects people. He meets his match in the evil Raka who he must face off to save the day.

TRIVIA

Trivia

The film was initially titled "Turbanator".

Nathan Jones is a famous former WWE wrestler who wrestled for WWE in 2003. The highlight of his career was tag teaming with The Undertaker at Wrestlemania 19 against The Big Show and A Train.

Tiger Shroff's father Jackie Shroff played a super hero in the film " Shiva Ka Insaaf".

Tiger shroff is trained in taekwondo and holds a black belt in it.

Tiger Shroff worked with Kay Kay for the first time
